pdhp121:1: napuṣpagandho paṭivātam eti na candanaṁ tagaraṁ vāhlikaṁ vā ।
pdhp121:2: satān tu gandho paṭivātam eti sabbā diśā sappuruṣo pravāti ।।
pdhp122:1: candanaṁ tagaraṁ cāpi uppalaṁ atha vāśśikiṁ ।
pdhp123:2: yo tu śīlavatāṁ gandho vāti devesu uttamo ।।
pdhp125:1: yathā pi ruciraṁ puṣpaṁ vannavantaṁ agandhakaṁ ।
pdhp125:2: evaṁ subhāṣitā vācā aphalā hoti akurvvato ।।
pdhp126:1: yathā pi ruciraṁ puṣpaṁ vannavantaṁ sagaṁdhakaṁ ।
pdhp126:2: evaṁ subhāṣitā vācā saphalā hoti kurvvato ।।
pdhp127:1: yathā pi bhramaro puṣpā vannagandham aheḍayaṁ ।
pdhp127:2: praḍeti rasam ādāya evaṁ ggrāme munī care ।।
pdhp128:2: suttaṁ ggrāmaṁ mahogho vā maccu-r-ādāya gacchati ।।
pdhp130:1: yathā pi puṣparāśimhā kayirā mālāguṇe bahū ।
pdhp130:2: evaṁ jātena māccena kātavvaṁ kuśalaṁ bahuṁ ।
pdhp131:1: ko imaṁ paṭhaviṁ vijehiti yamalokaṁ va imaṁ sadevakaṁ ।
pdhp131:2: ko dhammapade sudeśite kuśalo puṣpam iva prajehiti ।
pdhp132:1: śekho paṭhaviṁ vijehiti yamalokaṁ va imaṁ sadevakaṁ ।
pdhp132:2: so dhammapade sudeśite kuśalo puṣpam iva prajehiti ।।
pdhp133:2: evaṁ rāgañ ca doṣañ ca vipramuñcatha bhikkhavo ।।
pdhp134:1: phenopamaṁ lokam imaṁ vidittā marīcidhammaṁ abhisaṁbudhānāṁ ।
pdhp134:2: chettāna mārassa prapuṣpakāni addaṁśanaṁ maccurājassa gacche ।।
